data.title: Employees - Prof. em Dr Harald Müller
data.meta_description: With more than 80 employees PRIF is the largest institute for peace research in Germany.
data.text:
since 2019Senior Fellow and Supervisor at the Peace Research Center Prague, Prague University2013–2017Member of the Scientific Advisory Board (SAB) of the Austrian Institute for International Affairs (oiip)2011–2016Vice Chairman of the EU Non-Proliferation Consortium2007–2016Member of the Board of Directors of the Frankfurt University's Cluster of Excellence "The Formation of Normative Orders"2004–2005Member of the expert group on multilateral approaches to the nuclear fuel cycle2004Chairman of UN’s Advisory Board on Disarmament2001–2011Member of the Foundation Council of the Federal Foundation for Peace Research2000–2008Member of the Advisory Council of the Federal Academy for Security Policy1999–2000Member of the Commission on Security and the Future of the Armed Forces of the Federal Government1999–2016Co-Chairman of the Advisory Council on Peace and Conflict, Foreign Office, Germany1999–2005Member of the Advisory Board on Disarmament Matters of the UN Secretary General1998–2001Member of the Board of Trustees of the Alfred Herrhausen Society for International Dialogue1995, 2000,

2005, 2010,

2015Member of the German Delegation to the Review and Extension Conference of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treatysince 1994Co-Editor, "Zeitschrift für Internationale Beziehungen" (Journal "International Relations")1991–1993Deputy chairman, Section International Relations, German Association for Political Science1991–1998Visiting Lecturer at NATO Defense College, Rome1987–2001Member of the Core Group, Programme for Promoting Nuclear Non-Proliferation (PPNN)
